home-content.text1-content:
Get the current market value of each deposited trading card. Here we track the Ebay API to get the value and appreciation.

If an important trading card, please feel free to contact us.
home-content.text2-content: With the help of our site you will get more information about the card sets themselves: Which sets are in each cycle and when they were released.
home-content.text3-content: During different productions of the cards there were so called error prints. These error prints are stored in the respective maps. We offer various information on this.
home-content.text4-content: For each card, we query the population in PSA. For example, you can find out how many times a particular card has been graded in PSA 10.
home-content.feature-description1: On the YouTube channel you can find many helpful videos
home-content.feature-description2: On Twitch we offer regular livestreams
home-content.feature-description3: Here we upload current pictures of new sets
